titles.title: 2D Cortical Collecting Duct FTU for Kidney, v1.0

subjects.subject: 2D Cortical Collecting Duct FTU for Kidney, v1.0

descriptions.description: This functional tissue unit (FTU) illustration includes cell types related to the cortical collecting duct FTU in the Anatomical Structures, Cell Types and Biomarkers table in the [Kidney v1.2](https://cdn.humanatlas.io/hra-releases/v1.2/asct-b/ASCT-B_VH_Kidney.csv). This illustration was inspired by the [Kidney Tissue Atlas Explorer](https://atlas.kpmp.org/explorer/)created by the Kidney Precision Medicine Project (KPMP). Multiple histology atlases, especially “Human Microscopic Anatomy” (R.V. Krstić, 1994) and “Histology: A Text and Atlas” (Michael H. Ross, et al., 2003) were referenced. Cell type diameters were primarily defined by [(Hu, McDonough, and Layton 2021)](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.isci.2021.102667).

alternateIdentfiers.alternateIdentfier: Rachel Bajema 2022. *2D Reference Cortical Collecting Duct FTU for Kidney, v1.0.* https://doi.org/10.48539/HBM773.GJPC.954 . Accessed on December 15, 2022.

Rachel Bajema, Supriya Bidanta, Ellen Quardokus, Bruce W. Herr II, Katy Börner. 2022. [*HuBMAP CCF 2D Reference Object Library*](https://hubmapconsortium.github.io/ccf/pages/ccf-2d-reference-library.html). Accessed on December 15, 2022.
